title: Will Smith, Black People Slang, Bridgerton, Comedy Roulette and more.
itunes:title: Will Smith, Black People Slang, Bridgerton, Comedy Roulette and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! J. Anthony Brown starts off the show and he is not in a good mood. Watch out deh now! Bitterman advises a woman to stay out of her daddy's business. Will Smith will stop filming in Georgia because of the new Jim Crow. Fool #2 gives you examples of black people's slanguage. All Minnesota sports teams have postponed and rescheduled their games following the death of Daunte Wright. Comedy Roulette gives us the things that people say when they think there is a ghost in the house. We now know the real reason behind Rege-Jean's exit from Bridgerton. Today the show closes with the crew talking about what they would do with $1 at the the candy store.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
